Attributes.description: A survey of the literature of Hong Kong, from classical times to the present. Important periods in literary history (imperial, colonial, post-colonial), major authors (locals, visitors, and writers elsewhere), and important genres, including poetry, essays, and fiction.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 10:30, End Time: 12:00, Building: To, Room: Be
